item.title: CVE-2021-24298|2024-08-03T19:28:23.261Z -- igor%20benic -- simple%20giveaways%20%E2%80%93%20grow%20your%20business%2C%20email%20lists%20and%20traffic%20with%20contests
item.description: The method and share GET parameters of the Giveaway pages were not sanitised, validated or escaped before being output back in the pages, thus leading to reflected XSS
